title: RV32IMCK Power-Optimized Processor Design
description: Improve the RV32IMCK core (based on top Challenge_0009 designs) with a strong focus on reducing power while keeping 100% functionality.

scoring_details.functionality_description: Must pass all functional tests (100%). If functionality < 100%, design will be disqualified.
scoring_details.area_baseline_gates: Area target is 200000.0 micro square meter (same as Challenge_0009).
scoring_details.delay_target_ns: Throughput target is 100000000.0 instructions per second.
scoring_details.power_budget_mw: Aim for ~50 mW and keep < 100 mW.
scoring_details.final_score_requirement: Final Score (1/3 area + 1/3 delay + 1/3 power) must be â‰¥ 75.00 to qualify.
